alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 4:02AM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches, locally higher. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Traction restrictions are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will cross the area between 4-7 PM. Very heavy snow is expected with this front which will quickly impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
